title: Having issues Patching 6.11? Click Here!
body:
> #UPDATE 6/3:

>Our patcher team has noticed a higher than normal amount of ***"Unspecified Errors"*** occurring with the recent patch.  From doing a bit of digging, they suggest doing the following if you are getting this specific error:

>1. Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\ and delete the entire lol_game_client folder.
2. Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions\and delete the entire lol_game_client_sln folder.
3. Launch patcher and patch 

>This deletes your entire game client so not an ideal solution for those with bandwidth caps because this means you will have to re-download the game but you won't have to go through the entire scanning process.

>If you have some bandwidth caps:

>1. Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_game_client and delete 0.0.1.72 and 0.0.1.74.
2. Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions\lol_game_client_sln and delete 0.0.1.133
3. Launch patcher, wait for scanning to complete and observe patching.

>This method may take longer than method 1 but you will download less data since you're not deleting everything.


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hey all,

Sometimes League requires a little TLC (and no, we don't mean tender, loving, care).  When its a fight to the death, whether in lane or a steel cage, you throw anything you have at your opponent.

http://i.imgur.com/haQZxI1.gifv

If patcher errors suddenly made an unexpected entrance and reveals itself to be your nemesis all along, the following steps should be able to help out and pin the issue down (Hype announcer not guaranteed to be included).

----------------------------------------------

> #***Files Scanned reaches over 9000!!!!! Or, 15k, 20k, etc***

The patcher needs to scan already installed files to make sure that none of the files are corrupt.  If it finds one, it replaces it and rescans the files.  This is why it can sometimes get as high as 20k, even though there aren't 20k files in the installation.  

**The best thing to do is let it scan files!**  If you restart the client, it may cause it to scan even more files.   The patcher will eventually stop scanning files, and it will patch normally afterward.

> #***Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!

> #***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

--------------------------------------------------------------

*If after completing these steps, and you still do not see the glorious orange 'LAUNCH' button, feel free to drop us a post in this thread!  Rioters as well as Wrenchmen volunteers will be on hand to respond and provide some additional help!*

replies.body: so i love this riot i have 50mbps but your stupid patcher is only using 34-40kbps for "updating interface"

Game is NOT patching no matter WHAT. I've done every suggestion done and it keeps saying unspecified error then retries. It's been doing this over EIGHT hours. This is plain stupid, at least have the option of a damn manual download because this isn't worth it.
Updating but the download speed is mad slow. 41 KB/s. It's not my internet b/c I'm watching the EULCS as I'm waiting for the client to patch. What's going on yoo.
oh you know riot cares more about the eu lcs than making sure other people can actually play i mean it not like eu was last at msi or anything

You fucked up again, eh, Riot?

It's okay, none of us are surprised.

I have been trying to patch for the last hour, for some reason only getting 35kb/s for the download on "Updating Interface". Any reason for this slow download speed? Am I supposed to just leave this on overnight? I have never had such a slow speed updating the client before, and was wondering why.
Welp, guess I'm not playing tonight.

Tried resintalling, didn't help. Now I have 1988mb to download at ~35kb/s instead of 198 mb.

Guess I'm not playing league tonight.
Problem is fixed: used the solution provided by immortalfenixoo, changing preferred dns servers fixed the slow download.

Hey guys I found out what worked for my slow patch speed  I set up a DNS it is easy.
 
i followed the direction on this video its from Riot 

[](https://youtu.be/l5T95g-sju8)

https://youtu.be/l5T95g-sju8


I also found how to fix the error when i clicked the lol application it would not start up
so I went here

 C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\system
then 
right clicked on
rads_user_kernel    its an application
and pressed the compatibility tab
and clicked the run as administrator button and clicked apply  
this worked well now i am at 60 % in 5 min my speed varies from 3500-1500 KBps

I also deleted everything in this folder
C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\LeagueClient Logs but I am not sure if this helped or not. 
 

FYI i also uninstalled LOL and reinstalled it but do this only if these steps don't help you out first i feel it was not necessary. 

If it helps up vote this so it can help others 
 it will be a {{summoner:4}}  after you do this
I am now playing so this worked for me. Good luck everyone hope this helps.
thank you so much, this fixed my problem with the slow download as well.
When i click launch, it does nothing?! i have tried all the trouble shooting options. but none worked?

Patcher is excessively slow <40Kbs. I am able to download from steam over 100 times faster. Every other site and application is working fine. This is limited to Riot.
I am on windows 10 64 bit.
hey riot my friends patch there league like 5 mins WTF WHY ME SCANS FOREVER PLS REPLY OMFGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGGG
Patch speed very slow, 40KBps, never had this issue before, always patch within a few minutes.  I have seen a lot of other people have the same issue as well.
Well, guess I am not playing tonight...
try the fix posted by immortalfenixoo above, it fixed it for me

~40KBps download speed with my other computer download almost 10x the speed.
I tried to turn on/off ptp, tried to restart comp, tried to reset the IE to default, but nothing works. Please advise?

i click the game icon on my desktop and keep getting the message pvp.net patcher kernel has stopped working how can i fix this i have uninstalled the game then went to the website and tried to reinstall it downloaded the game client again and getting the same message wth is goin on
Patch is extremely slow 40kbps and 100% sure its not my internet. Know this is a problem , any solutions?

Hey there Liplip

Can you give me some more context on the troubles you're having with your Patch, such as the percentage you can get to before you experience problems? I might be able to give a solution.

Also, even if you feel confident your internet is not to blame, I strongly urge just trying [our Connection KB's](http://riot.com/12B7oac) steps to make sure things are aok in that department, even if your browsing and other online games are working without trouble.

Let me know if that helps out at all, or give me some more details so I can help you out. :)
The patcher speed is crazy slow! 33 kbps. 50 minutes later and 10% patched

Hello Emperor Taric

That sounds unusual, but if you're still having trouble we'd suggest going through [our Connection KB](http://riot.com/12B7oac) to make sure that your Connection is solid as you're patching. Just to be safe; sometimes your connection can be really awesome for other programs but the settings don't mesh with LoL.

Hoping this gets your patch on the fast track!

I have already scanned all my files three times, restarted my internet and triple checked my antivirus and antimalware. The patch keeps giving me the unspecified error. I did every recommended. It may not be happening to everyone but it's happening {{item:3070}} I hope you guys can post a solution once you find one.

UPDATE: So, without the updating part, I decided to try to repair it. The repairing also gave me the error and the launch button appered!? I clicked it and it didn't work.  I feel like that might be important info. @_@ if not my bad .

now it justs says update failed.

Completely unable to patch,  sometimes it wont even finish scanning before it gives me an error other times its gets to around 10% before I get one. I have gone through the support site for 3 hours attempting to fix it and nothing has worked, I am rather unhappy with this.

I don't know is it just me? but the downloading speed is super slow for this update. It is like 33kbs and after almost half an hour I am still at 0%. My internet is good and it used to just take 2 to at most 5 min to finish an update. something wrong Riot?
and I had just deleted the game and downloaded and installed it again. now it doesn't even go to the interface. also, it took me about 15min to download the installer which  is extremely unusual.

Yo MYG!

What you're describing sounds like a recent development with your Permissions that may be causing the Patch to be interrupted. These can be hard to spot because other things will run fine but LoL won't; usually things are Permissions errors when the Patch has troubles before it reaches about 33%. But we have some [steps in this KB](http://riot.com/1SB1JXQ) here that you can use to troubleshoot and make sure things are a ok. 

Let me know if after trying this your Patch runs smoother! :)

So... I have been getting to the Launch but after launch nothing.  I have done several different steps from several different posts (which I find troubling are needed to begin with); deleting rads files, restarting computer, fixing anti-virus list, Changing Anti-virus completely, Trying without an anti-virus at all even! I have reinstalled I have done it all other than literally wiping my computer and giving a complete fresh windows install which I'm Not doing as literally it worked just what... a few weeks ago? without any change other than on your end. 

Why doesn't it open consistently without me having to end the process 5 times, (this happened a few patches ago as well, it had stopped) Why is it now doing this again and Why do I have to deal with the all the hassle? 

Thanks. I've been playing for a long time and I feel this should never happen ever, in ANY game. Essentially being told "hey so we messed up and sent ya'll a massive failure. so go in here and do this then this, then this, then fingers crossed it'll work. if not rinse and repeat till something changes or you'll get lucky." <- **Not a Positive sign for things to come.**

Back to my lovely ending-process-and-deleting-rads-file-or-uninstall-depending-on-how-many-hours-I-want-to-dedicate-to-opening-your-game-today-and-repeat-till-I-get-a-login-screen fun.
Please Guys Help me patcher is only at 30 kbps. In this way it will take forever. Im using mac so don't know what to do :(

I have a problem with my ping it was first 90 ms and 100 fbs ... my problem begun afew days ago my ping now is 250 - 500 ms and 200 - 350 fbs ... what the hell is that ... I can't play at all ... and I got reported becuase of that ... it always say attempting to reconnect ... please anyone tell me a solution for my problem :(
my game is stooping and work and again and again like wtf. People are reporting me now because they say I'm afking or lie about the lagging and my ms

hey riot my game is up to date. the only thing that really annoys me is that i get a leave buster every time i complete a game. i dont go afk nor do i leave the game, im all in doing what i need to do. i get my work done. sad thing is that i still get a 5 minute leave buster for no reason. i dont know if this is a bug, but you guys really screwed up in this patch from the looks of it. i really dont wanna have to wait over and over again just to play a game......{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Game crashed now i have to wait 20' to play the game.Better delete this Game
ok so this is weired. patching is causing my computer to crash fully. it just freezes the second it starts scanning. I can patch other games just fine and use steam so I don't think its my computer

Heyo Coldwave!

Crashes because of the Patch is not a likely outcome, but there might be things that the Patch is adding that aren't compatible with your current configurations. However, [running through our Crashing KB](http://riot.com/1Fa5J8l) might be able to help you out with this, giving solutions for multiple causes to the crash and helping the Patch run smoothly.

If after running through these steps you encounter another problem with the patch, let me know and we'll come up with other solutions.

I've been waiting for 2 hours now and yet I cannot go through the "Unspecified Error" part. In that sense, I cannot play until it is cleared. I've done all the steps I could obtain, including restarting the laptop, but nothing. I even have a ticket asking for help.

Greetings Raichu!

Sounds like that could be related to a Permissions error! Fear not, we have troubleshooting for that. :D

Run through the [steps in this KB](http://riot.com/1SB1JXQ) to help find a solution to this problem, and let me know if it gets rid of the error and gets your Patch on it's feet and moving. :)

EDIT: I'd also suggest trying the method we updated to our original post at the top to see if that can work as well. ^^

I've went through all of the steps and i'm still patching extremely slow. i've been patching for now over 6 hours and at 18%. It says updating interface and its running at under 59KBps

I have charter, did a speed test(noncharter website), DL speed is 60+Mbps, made sure there was room on my pc, closed all other programs, made sure nothing else was using internet, set my priorities to high on all things league/ended all tasks not needed, last week the patch was practically instant, went through and deleted suggested files, turned off anti-virus. Ive never had a patch so slow, normally my patch is always faster than most of the people I play with, after the first hour is when I restarted my client, made sure that all things lol were allowed through my firewall, also did the repair tool, and i'm using a Ethernet cable.

*update* at 19% Update failed: Unspecified error occurred. Please check logs for more information.
please help, i've searched all over, but either there is no solution, or the people having the issue receives no help
I have since uninstalled lol, and deleted all files. But after the client was installed and the patcher launched it still is unbearably slow, I also ran it as administrator.
Doing the math at 36kbps with 1922mb would take me ~14 hours 50m, and assuming how last time it crashed 19% I don't feel like I will ever patch, this is so stressful.

Hey there Kimimaro

That sounds like a real doozy, and we respect the lengths that you've gone trying to troubleshoot and searching for a solution. Normally when there is an unspecified error occurring it's a sign that there's connection issues or perhaps something blocking the patch from being implemented. However that initial percentage is usually the patcher just updating itself. If you've gone through [the Connection KB's steps](http://riot.com/12B7oac), including ones related to firewalls, then that should not be a problem.

Since the patch is still not being cooperative we suggest hitting up our Tech team for help in a ticket. You can open one by [following this link here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to help you out asap to find a fix for your patch. While you're waiting for a response from them, we suggest going through all the steps in our [Permissions article](http://riot.com/1SB1JXQ), once more if you have already.

 Let me know how it goes and if you're able to patch. :)

So I got back form school today hoping to play some ranked but guess what happens there's an update, I get happy  my friend tells me its fast it took him 5 minuets, and I am still stuck at 33% for like 5 hours I would love to play some ranked today <3

Hey there Hetsygai!

Normally if a patch is stuck at 33% it is the cause of a Connection error. It's likely that this could still be happening knowing that, so we urge you to run through [our Connection KB](http://riot.com/12B7oac) to make sure everything is solid in the network department. If everything checks out, you should be able to patch normally, but if not just reply to this post and let me know. We'll look for an alternative fix. :)
